channel.title: Agility ticket help
channel.description:
How can I make it so when I finish one turn of gnome agility course, it's giving me an agility ticket.
PS Only when you did all course step by step or people will glitch and cheat. Don't tell me to add objects around course to make a course, I don't want to add objects.
Thanks.

item.title: Agility ticket help
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

Ye it’s a good idea but I want the people that they need to do a turn absolutly to get a ticket. It’s possible… Dodian had it. Or they will cheat to get the ticket. They will only click on same thing and they will autoclick to get 100000 tickets.

Read full topic

item.title: Agility ticket help
item.dc:creator: @jeddac jeddac
item.description:
@jeddac wrote:

i mean when they go past the log/up the netting ETC give them a token for it,

then create a shop or make a code that when they have say 5-6 tokens (5-6 obstacles on the course)
they trade it for/recieve a agility ticket?

Read full topic

item.title: Agility ticket help
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

jeddac:

give them say a token for the first 5 and you can trade the token for a ticket? (eg. ecto token?)

I don’t what you mean but I don’t want this lol.

Read full topic
